title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 on multimodal machine learning (ML

Here's a reading list of 20 articles on multimodal machine learning (ML) up to 2022. These articles cover various aspects of multimodal ML, including data preprocessing, feature learning, multimodal fusion, and applications in various domains
Multimodal Learning: A Survey
This article provides a comprehensive overview of multimodal learning, including its history, challenges, and future directions
Multimodal Deep Learning for Computer Vision and Audio
This article discusses the application of deep learning to multimodal data, with a focus on computer vision and audio
Multimodal Learning for Natural Language Processing
This article explores the use of multimodal learning in natural language processing, including applications in sentiment analysis and machine translation
Multimodal Deep Learning for Biomedical Image Analysis
G
